---
title: "Get started with Microsoft Viva Insights (Workplace Analytics)"
excerpt: "Collaboration is a key component of knowledge-worker success. Microsoft Viva Insights (Workplace Analytics) turns Microsoft 365 data into useful insights about how organizations get work done and empowers leaders to drive strategies for positive change. Get started with Microsoft Workplace Analytics introduces how you can use Workplace Analytics to access these insights. You will learn what Workplace Analytics is and how it works, how to onboard to Workplace Analytics from the administrator perspective, how you can evaluate and track collaboration with the Ways of working assessment, and how you can use Workplace Analytics and MyAnalytics to drive organizational change."
